alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:31AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Warrick, southeastern Gibson, northwestern Vanderburgh and northeastern Posey Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 730 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cynthiana, or 7 miles southwest of Fort Branch, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fort Branch and Haubstadt around 745 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 20 and 28. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 12 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
